thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 21 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ALJ Regional Says Court Issued Opinion In Previously Disclosed Litigation Filed By Co's Unit Against 3M

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ALJ Regional Says Court Issued Opinion In Previously Disclosed Litigation Filed By Co's Unit Against 3M
text:
May 21 (Reuters) - ALJ Regional Holdings Inc:
* ALJ REGIONAL - ON MAY 15, COURT ISSUED OPINION IN PREVIOUSLY DISCLOSED LITIGATION FILED BY COâ€™S UNIT AGAINST 3M COMPANY REGARDING A 3M CONTRACT
* ALJ REGIONAL - AS RESULT OF REVIEW, CO INTENDS TO REDUCE OUTSTANDING ASSETS RELATING TO 3M CONTRACT TO ZERO IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FOR Q3 2018
* ALJ REGIONAL HOLDINGS INC - REAFFIRMS GUIDANCE RANGE FOR FULL FISCAL YEAR ENDING SEPT 30, 2018 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2GCiXST ) Further company coverage:
